services.name: Redwood API
services.installCommand: yarn set version stable && cd flightcontrol && NODE_ENV=development yarn install --immutable
services.buildCommand: cd flightcontrol && yarn rw deploy flightcontrol api
services.startCommand: cd flightcontrol && yarn rw deploy flightcontrol api --serve

services.name: Redwood Web
services.installCommand: yarn set version stable && cd flightcontrol && NODE_ENV=development yarn install --immutable
services.buildCommand: cd flightcontrol && yarn rw deploy flightcontrol web
